attributes.action: Look into the unfairness of Pension rights to Widows on their remarriage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At present Widow/s who remarry under retirement age lose their widow/s pension on remarriage. They also lose their right to any service pension that they would be entitled to from payments made by their late husband(partner) during his/her service with the Armed Forces. 
The petition is that all widow/s who remarry should be able retain rights to all full pensions which they would normally have been entitled if they had not remarried.
